overview: Middle-aged actor Chinu Nandy (Mithun Chakraborty) lives a humble but happy existence, making a modest living playing bit parts in movies. But one day, his dream of making a splash in the film world seems like it's about to come true. World-famous director Joy Sundar Sen (Sabyasachi Chakraborty) taps the relative unknown to star in his new movie: an epic tale of a man who discovers how to bring the dead back to life.
title: Dry Red Chillies
